attributes.action: ANZAC Contribution to World War 1 be recognised.
attributes.additional_details: Her Majesty's Government wants to airbrush the magnificent contribution of ANZACs during World War 1 from the Centenary commemorations. We, the signatories to this Petition, feel that it is an insult to the memory of those who made the supreme sacrifice. We call upon Her Majesty's Government to include the ANZACs in commemorating that conflict.
